price: Maka makanlah yang halal lagi baik dari rezeki yang telah diberikan Allah kepadamu dan syukurilah nikmat Allah, jika kamu hanya kepada-Nya saja menyembah.
arabic: فَكُلُواْ مِمَّا رَزَقَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ حَلَٰلٗا طَيِّبٗا وَٱشۡكُرُواْ نِعۡمَتَ ٱللَّهِ إِن كُنتُمۡ إِيَّاهُ تَعۡبُدُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fakulū mimmā razaqakumu al-lahu ḥalālan ṭayyiban wa-ush'kurū niʿ'mata al-lahi in kuntum iyyāhu taʿbudūna
